title: Metamath formal systems
content: This is a formalization of Appendix C of the Metamath book, which describes the mathematical representation of a formal system, of which set.mm (this file) is one.

df-mcn
blocks.content: Define the set of constants in a Metamath formal system. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mvar
blocks.content: Define the set of variables in a Metamath formal system. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mty
blocks.content: Define the type function in a Metamath formal system. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mtc
blocks.content: Define the set of typecodes in a Metamath formal system. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mmax
blocks.content: Define the set of axioms in a Metamath formal system. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mvt
blocks.content: Define the set of variable typecodes in a Metamath formal system. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mrex
blocks.content: Define the set of "raw expressions", which are expressions without a typecode attached. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mex
blocks.content: Define the set of expressions, which are strings of constants and variables headed by a typecode constant. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mdv
blocks.content: Define the set of distinct variable conditions, which are pairs of distinct variables. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mvrs
blocks.content: Define the set of variables in an expression. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: df-mrsub
blocks.content: Define a substitution of raw expressions given a mapping from variables to expressions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mrsub(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cmrsub, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, co(cfv(cmrex, cv(s0)), cpm, cfv(cmvar, cv(s0))), cmpt(s2, cfv(cmrex, cv(s0)), co(cfv(cfrmd, cun(cfv(cmcn, cv(s0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(s0)))), cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s3, cun(cfv(cmcn, cv(s0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(s0))), cif(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3)), cs1(cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cdm(cv(s1))))), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mrsub(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ mRSubst =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(s1 ∈((mREx ` s0)[p↦](mVR ` s0))↦(s2 ∈(mREx ` s0)↦((freeMnd `((mCN ` s0)⋃(mVR ` s0)))[gsum]((s3 ∈((mCN ` s0)⋃(mVR ` s0))↦ if(s3 ∈ dom(s1),(s1 ` s3), <" s3 ">))∘ s2)))))
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-msub

blocks.name: df-msr
blocks.content: Define the reduct of a pre-statement. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-msr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cmsr, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cmpst, cv(s0)), csb(s2, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), csb(s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cotp(cin(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, cv(s1))), csb(s4, cuni(cima(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cun(cv(s2), csn(cv(s3))))), cxp(cv(s4), cv(s4)))), cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-msr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ mStRed =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(s1 ∈(mPreSt ` s0)↦[(2nd `(1st ` s1))/ s2][(2nd ` s1)/ s3]<((1st `(1st ` s1))⋂[⋃((mVars ` s0)"(s2 ⋃ { s3 }))/ s4](s4 × s4)), s2, s3 >))
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-mcls
blocks.content: Define the closure of a set of statements relative to a set of disjointness constraints. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mcls(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7, setvar s8, setvar s9) {
  |- wceq(cmcls, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cpw(cfv(cmdv, cv(s0))), cpw(cfv(cmex, cv(s0))), cint(cab(s3, wa(wss(cun(cv(s2), crn(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)))), cv(s3)), wal(s4, wal(s5, wal(s6, wi(wcel(cotp(cv(s4), cv(s5), cv(s6)), cfv(cmax, cv(s0))), wral(s7, crn(cfv(cmsub, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wss(cima(cv(s7), cun(cv(s5), crn(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0))))), cv(s3)), wal(s8, wal(s9, wi(wbr(cv(s8), cv(s4), cv(s9)), wss(cxp(cfv(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s7), cfv(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)), cv(s8)))), cfv(cfv(cmvrs, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s7), cfv(cfv(cmvh, cv(s0)), cv(s9))))), cv(s1)))))), wcel(cfv(cv(s7), cv(s6)), cv(s3))))))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s6)
  -| diffss(s3, s7)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s8)
  -| diffss(s3, s9)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s6)
  -| diffss(s1, s7)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s8)
  -| diffss(s1, s9)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s7)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s8)
  -| diffss(s2, s9)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s6)
  -| diffss(s4, s7)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s4, s8)
  -| diffss(s4, s9)
  -| diffss(s5, s6)
  -| diffss(s5, s7)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s5, s8)
  -| diffss(s5, s9)
  -| diffss(s6, s7)
  -| diffss(s0, s6)
  -| diffss(s6, s8)
  -| diffss(s6, s9)
  -| diffss(s0, s7)
  -| diffss(s7, s8)
  -| diffss(s7, s9)
  -| diffss(s0, s8)
  -| diffss(s0, s9)
  -| diffss(s8, s9)
}

blocks.name: df-mpps
blocks.content: Define the set of provable pre-statements. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mpps(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cmpps, cmpt(s0, universe, coprab(s1, s2, s3, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s1), cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cmpst, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s3), co(cv(s1), cfv(cmcls, cv(s0)), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mpps(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ mPPSt =(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { < < s1, s2 >, s3 > |(< s1, s2, s3 > ∈(mPreSt ` s0)∧ s3 ∈(s1[(mCls ` s0)]s2))})
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: mvtval
blocks.content: The set of variable typecodes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mvtval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, crn(c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmvt, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmty, c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(c0, crn(c1), cfv(cmvt, c2), crn(cfv(cmty, c2)))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cmvt, c2), crn(cfv(cmty, c2))), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, cmvt, crn(cfv(cmty, c2)), crn(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0))))
  rneqd(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmty, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cmty)
  df-mvt(hs0)
  rnex(cfv(cmty, c2))
  fvex(cmty, c2)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cmvt, c2), crn(cfv(cmty, c2)), emptycls, crn(emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  eqcomi(emptycls, crn(emptycls))
  rn0()
  fvprc(c2, cmvt)
  rneqd(cfv(cmty, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cmty)
  rneqi(c1, cfv(cmty, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cfv(cmty, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mvtval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ c0 = ran(c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(mVT ` c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(mType ` c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(c0, ran(c1), (mVT ` c2), ran((mType ` c2)))
  pm2.61i((mVT ` c2)= ran((mType ` c2)), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, cmvt, ran((mType ` c2)), ran((mType ` hs0)))
  rneqd((mType ` hs0), (mType ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, cmty)
  df-mvt(hs0)
  rnex((mType ` c2))
  fvex(cmty, c2)
  3eqtr4a((mVT ` c2), ran((mType ` c2)), emptycls, ran(∅), ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqcomi(emptycls, ran(∅))
  rn0()
  fvprc(c2, cmvt)
  rneqd((mType ` c2), emptycls, ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c2, cmty)
  rneqi(c1, (mType ` c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(ran((mType ` c2)))
}

blocks.name: mrexval
blocks.content: The set of "raw expressions", which are expressions without a typecode, that is, just sequences of constants and variables. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mrexval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cword(cun(c3, c4))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmcn, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmvar, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrex, c0))
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, cword(cun(c3, c4)), cfv(cmrex, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cmrex, c0), cword(cun(c3, c4))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt3i(hs0, c0, universe, cmrex, cword(cun(c3, c4)), cword(cun(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cword(cun(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)))), cword(cun(c3, c4))), wceq(cun(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))), cun(c3, c4)))
  uneq12d(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), c3, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cmcn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmcn)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cmvar, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmvar)
  wrdeq(cun(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))), cun(c3, c4))
  df-mrex(hs0)
  wrdexi(cun(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))))
  unex(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)))
  fvex(cmcn, cv(hs0))
  fvex(cmvar, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cword(cun(c3, c4)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mrexval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 = Word((c3 ⋃ c4)))
  ⊣ c3 =(mCN ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(mVR ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(mREx ` c0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c2, Word((c3 ⋃ c4)), (mREx ` c0), c0 ∈ c1)
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, (mREx ` c0)= Word((c3 ⋃ c4)), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt3i(hs0, c0, universe, cmrex, Word((c3 ⋃ c4)), Word(((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0))))
  syl(hs0 = c0, Word(((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0)))= Word((c3 ⋃ c4)), ((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0))=(c3 ⋃ c4))
  uneq12d((mCN ` hs0), (mVR ` hs0), c3, c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mCN ` hs0), c3, (mCN ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmcn)
  syl6eqr((mVR ` hs0), c4, (mVR ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmvar)
  wrdeq(((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0)), (c3 ⋃ c4))
  df-mrex(hs0)
  wrdexi(((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0)))
  unex((mCN ` hs0), (mVR ` hs0))
  fvex(cmcn, hs0)
  fvex(cmvar, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(Word((c3 ⋃ c4)))
}

blocks.name: mexval
blocks.content: The set of expressions, which are pairs whose first element is a typecode, and whose second element is a raw expression. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mexval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmtc, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmex, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrex, c3))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cfv(cmex, c3))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cmex, c3), cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvmpt3i(hs0, c3, universe, cmex, cxp(c1, c2), cxp(cfv(cmtc, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmrex, cv(hs0))))
  xpeq12d(cfv(cmtc, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmrex, cv(hs0)), c1, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmtc, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cmtc, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cmtc)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmrex, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmrex, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cmrex)
  df-mex(hs0)
  xpex(cfv(cmtc, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmrex, cv(hs0)))
  fvex(cmtc, cv(hs0))
  fvex(cmrex, cv(hs0))
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cmex, c3), cxp(c1, c2), emptycls, cxp(c1, emptycls), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  eqcomi(emptycls, cxp(c1, emptycls))
  xp0(c1)
  fvprc(c3, cmex)
  xpeq2d(c1, c2, emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, cfv(cmrex, c3), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, cmrex)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mexval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ c0 =(c1 × c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(mTC ` c3)
  ⊣ c0 =(mEx ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(mREx ` c3)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, (c1 × c2), (mEx ` c3))
  pm2.61i((mEx ` c3)=(c1 × c2), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt3i(hs0, c3, universe, cmex, (c1 × c2), ((mTC ` hs0)×(mREx ` hs0)))
  xpeq12d((mTC ` hs0), (mREx ` hs0), c1, c2, hs0 = c3)
  syl6eqr((mTC ` hs0), c1, (mTC ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cmtc)
  syl6eqr((mREx ` hs0), c2, (mREx ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cmrex)
  df-mex(hs0)
  xpex((mTC ` hs0), (mREx ` hs0))
  fvex(cmtc, hs0)
  fvex(cmrex, hs0)
  3eqtr4a((mEx ` c3), (c1 × c2), emptycls, (c1 × ∅), ¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqcomi(emptycls, (c1 × ∅))
  xp0(c1)
  fvprc(c3, cmex)
  xpeq2d(c1, c2, emptycls, ¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, (mREx ` c3), ¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c3, cmrex)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × c2))
}

thm mexval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

blocks.name: mdvval
blocks.content: The set of disjoint variable conditions, which are pairs of distinct variables. (This definition differs from appendix C, which uses unordered pairs instead. We use ordered pairs, but all sets of disjoint variable conditions of interest will be symmetric, so it does not matter.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

thm mdvval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cmvar)
  df-mdv(hs0)
  ax-mp(wcel(cdif(cxp(cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))), cid), universe), wcel(cxp(cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))), universe))
  xpex(cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)))
  fvex(cmvar, cv(hs0))
  difexg(cxp(cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))), universe, cid)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cmdv, c2), cdif(cxp(c1, c1), cid), emptycls, cdif(emptycls, cid), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  eqcomi(emptycls, cdif(emptycls, cid))
  0dif(cid)
  fvprc(c2, cmdv)
  difeq1d(cxp(c1, c1), cid, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl6eq(cxp(c1, c1), emptycls, cxp(c1, emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))

thm mvrsval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ` c0)=(ran((2nd ` c0))⋂ c3))

thm mvrsfpw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  sylancr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(crn(cfv(c2nd, c0)), cfn), wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cfv(c2nd, c0))), cfn), wfo(cfv(c2nd, c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cfv(c2nd, c0))), crn(cfv(c2nd, c0))))

  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(cfv(c2nd, c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cfv(c2nd, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cword(cun(cfv(cmcn, c4), c3))), wf(cfv(c2nd, c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cfv(c2nd, c0))), cun(cfv(cmcn, c4), c3)))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, cxp(cfv(cmtc, c4), cword(cun(cfv(cmcn, c4), c3))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, c0), cword(cun(cfv(cmcn, c4), c3))))

  ffn(cfv(c2nd, c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cfv(c2nd, c0))), cun(cfv(cmcn, c4), c3))
  dffn4(cfv(c2nd, c0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cfv(c2nd, c0))))
  fofi(co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cfv(c2nd, c0))), cfv(c2nd, c0), crn(cfv(c2nd, c0)))

thm mvrsfpw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ` c0)∈(P(c3)⋂ Fin))

  3syl(c0 ∈ c1, (2nd ` c0)[Fn](0[..^](# `(2nd ` c0))), (2nd ` c0)∈ Word(((mCN ` c4)⋃ c3)), ((2nd ` c0):(0[..^](# `(2nd ` c0)))→((mCN ` c4)⋃ c3)))

blocks.name: mrsubffval
blocks.content: The substitution of some variables for expressions in a raw expression. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mrsubffval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, co(c3, cpm, c4), cmpt(s1, c3, co(c5, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s2, cun(c6, c4), cif(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cs1(cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cv(s0))))), cv(s1)))))))

thm mrsubffval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1)))))
  ⊣ c6 =(mCN ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(mVR ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(mREx ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(mRSubst ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(freeMnd `(c6 ⋃ c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))))), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))))), d(s0, c6))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))))), d(s1, c3))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))))), d(s1, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))))), d(s1, c5))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))))), d(s1, c6))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))))), d(s2, c0))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 → c2 =(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))))), d(s2, c3))
  syl5eq(c2, (s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1)))), (mRSubst ` c0), c0 ∈ c1)
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, (mRSubst ` c0)=(s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1)))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cmrsub, (s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1)))), (s0 ∈((mREx ` hs0)[p↦](mVR ` hs0))↦(s1 ∈(mREx ` hs0)↦((freeMnd `((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0)))[gsum]((s2 ∈((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0))↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1)))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, ((mREx ` hs0)[p↦](mVR ` hs0)), (s1 ∈(mREx ` hs0)↦((freeMnd `((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0)))[gsum]((s2 ∈((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0))↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))), (c3[p↦]c4), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))), hs0 = c0)
  oveq12d((mREx ` hs0), cpm, (mVR ` hs0), c3, c4, hs0 = c0)
  mpteq12dv(s1, (mREx ` hs0), ((freeMnd `((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0)))[gsum]((s2 ∈((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0))↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1)), c3, (c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1)), hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mREx ` hs0), c3, (mREx ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmrex)
  oveq12d((freeMnd `((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0))), cgsu, ((s2 ∈((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0))↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1), c5, ((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1), hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((freeMnd `((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0))), c5, (freeMnd `(c6 ⋃ c4)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(cfrmd, ((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0)), (c6 ⋃ c4), hs0 = c0)
  coeq1d((s2 ∈((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0))↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">)), s1, (s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">)), hs0 = c0)
  mpteq1d(s2, ((mCN ` hs0)⋃(mVR ` hs0)), if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">), (c6 ⋃ c4), hs0 = c0)
  uneq12d((mCN ` hs0), (mVR ` hs0), c6, c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mCN ` hs0), c6, (mCN ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmcn)
  syl6eqr((mVR ` hs0), c4, (mVR ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmvar)
  df-mrsub(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mptex(s0, (c3[p↦]c4), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1))))
  ovex(c3, cpm, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈(c3[p↦]c4)↦(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5[gsum]((s2 ∈(c6 ⋃ c4)↦ if(s2 ∈ dom(s0),(s0 ` s2), <" s2 ">))∘ s1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cun.s(s2, (mCN ` hs0), (mVR ` hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cmcn, hs0)
  diff.cmcn.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cmvar, hs0)
  diff.cmvar.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.cun.s(s2, c6, c4)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cpm, c4)

thm mrsubfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wss(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, c0), cmpt(s0, c2, co(c5, cgsu, ccom(cmpt(s1, cun(c6, c3), cif(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cs1(cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmcn, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmvar, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrex, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrsub, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cfrmd, cun(c6, c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
} = {

blocks.name: mrsubrn
blocks.content: Although it is defined for partial mappings of variables, every partial substitution is a substitution on some complete mapping of the variables. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

  eqssi(crn(c0), cima(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  pm2.61i(wss(crn(c0), cima(c0, co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(c3, universe))

  biimpi(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wcel(c0, cima(c1, co(cfv(cmrex, c2), cmap, cfv(cmvar, c2)))))

thm mrsubf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wf(c0, c2, c2))

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmrex, c3))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wf(c0, c2, c2), wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, c2)))
  sseldd(c0, co(c2, cmap, c2), crn(c1), wcel(c0, crn(c1)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wss(crn(c1), co(c2, cmap, c2)), wcel(c3, universe), wf(c1, co(c2, cpm, cfv(cmvar, c3)), co(c2, cmap, c2)))
  nsyl2(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(crn(c1), emptycls))
  n0i(c0, crn(c1))
  rnfvprc(c3, c1, cmrsub)
  mrsubff(c3, universe, c1, c2, cfv(cmvar, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cmvar, c3))

  id(wcel(c0, crn(c1)))

}

blocks.name: elmrsubrn
blocks.content: Characterization of the substitutions as functions from expressions to expressions that distribute under concatenation and map constants to themselves. (The constant part uses ` ( C \ V ) ` because we don't know that ` C ` and ` V ` are disjoint until we get to ~ ismfs .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: mrsubco
blocks.content: The composition of two substitutions is a substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: mrsubvrs
blocks.content: The set of variables in a substitution is the union, indexed by the variables in the original expression, of the variables in the substitution to that variable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: msubrn
blocks.content: Although it is defined for partial mappings of variables, every partial substitution is a substitution on some complete mapping of the variables. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

  mpd((c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1[p↦]c2)), (hs1 ∈(mEx ` c3)↦ <(1st ` hs1),(((mRSubst ` c3)` hs0)`(2nd ` hs1))>)∈(c0 "(c1[↦]c2)), ∃(hs2 ∈(c1[↦]c2),((mRSubst ` c3)` hs2)=((mRSubst ` c3)` hs0)))

thm msubf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wf(c0, c2, c2))

} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wf(c0, c2, c2), wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, c2)))
  sseldd(c0, co(c2, cmap, c2), crn(c1), wcel(c0, crn(c1)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wss(crn(c1), co(c2, cmap, c2)), wcel(c3, universe), wf(c1, co(cfv(cmrex, c3), cpm, cfv(cmvar, c3)), co(c2, cmap, c2)))
  nsyl2(wcel(c0, crn(c1)), wcel(c3, universe), wceq(crn(c1), emptycls))
  n0i(c0, crn(c1))
  rnfvprc(c3, c1, cmsub)
  msubff(c3, universe, c1, cfv(cmrex, c3), cfv(cmvar, c3), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cmvar, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cmrex, c3))
  frn(c1, co(cfv(cmrex, c3), cpm, cfv(cmvar, c3)), co(c2, cmap, c2))
  id(wcel(c0, crn(c1)))
  elmapi(c0, c2, c2)
}

  eqcomi(emptycls, (({ s0 ∈ P(c1)| `' s0 = s0 } ×(P(c2)⋂ Fin))× ∅))
  xp0(({ s0 ∈ P(c1)| `' s0 = s0 } ×(P(c2)⋂ Fin)))

thm mpstssv(class c0, class c1) {

  eqsstri(c0, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe), cxp(cxp(crab(hs0, cpw(cfv(cmdv, c1)), wceq(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), cin(cpw(cfv(cmex, c1)), cfn)), cfv(cmex, c1)))

  eqid(cfv(cmdv, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmex, c1))
  mp2an(wss(cxp(cxp(crab(hs0, cpw(cfv(cmdv, c1)), wceq(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), cin(cpw(cfv(cmex, c1)), cfn)), cfv(cmex, c1)), cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)), wss(cxp(crab(hs0, cpw(cfv(cmdv, c1)), wceq(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), cin(cpw(cfv(cmex, c1)), cfn)), cxp(universe, universe)), wss(cfv(cmex, c1), universe))
  xpss(crab(hs0, cpw(cfv(cmdv, c1)), wceq(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))), cin(cpw(cfv(cmex, c1)), cfn))
  ssv(cfv(cmex, c1))

  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmdv, c1))

}

blocks.name: msrrcl
blocks.content: If ` X ` and ` Y ` have the same reduct, then one is a pre-statement iff the other is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm msrrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmpst, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsr, c4))
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c3))
  a1i(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wi(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c3)))
  ffvelrni(c1, c3, c0, c3)
  syl5ibr(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c3), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))
  ffvelrni(c2, c3, c0, c3)
  ex(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c3), wb(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)))
  2thd(wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c3)), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantl(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c3), wcel(c1, c3))
  ndmfvrcl(c0, c1, c3)
  syl(wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c3)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))
  biimpa(wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c3), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c3))
  eleq1(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c0, c2), c3)
  ndmfvrcl(c0, c2, c3)
  fdmi(c0, c3, c3)
  msrf(c0, c3, c4)
  mto(wcel(emptycls, c3), wcel(emptycls, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)))
  0nelxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)
  sseli(emptycls, c3, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe))
  mpstssv(c3, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm msrrcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2)→(c1 ∈ c3 ↔ c2 ∈ c3))
  ⊣ c3 =(mPreSt ` c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(mStRed ` c4)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3, (c0 ` c1)∈ c3)
  a1i((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), (c1 ∈ c3 →(c0 ` c1)∈ c3))
  ffvelrni(c1, c3, c0, c3)
  syl5ibr((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), c2 ∈ c3, (c0 ` c1)∈ c3, (c0 ` c2)∈ c3)
  ffvelrni(c2, c3, c0, c3)
  ex((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c1)∈ c3, (c1 ∈ c3 ↔ c2 ∈ c3))
  2thd(((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2)∧(c0 ` c1)∈ c3), c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  adantl((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c1)∈ c3, c1 ∈ c3)
  ndmfvrcl(c0, c1, c3)
  syl(((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2)∧(c0 ` c1)∈ c3), c2 ∈ c3, (c0 ` c2)∈ c3)
  biimpa((c0 ` c1)=(c0 ` c2), (c0 ` c1)∈ c3, (c0 ` c2)∈ c3)
  eleq1((c0 ` c1), (c0 ` c2), c3)
  ndmfvrcl(c0, c2, c3)
  fdmi(c0, c3, c3)
  msrf(c0, c3, c4)
  mto(∅ ∈ c3, ∅ ∈((𝕌 × 𝕌)× 𝕌))
  0nelxp((𝕌 × 𝕌), universe)
  sseli(emptycls, c3, ((𝕌 × 𝕌)× 𝕌))
  mpstssv(c3, c4)
}

blocks.name: mstaval
blocks.content: Value of the set of statements. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mstaval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, crn(c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmsr, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsta, c2))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, crn(c1), cfv(cmsta, c2))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cmsta, c2), crn(c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, cmsta, crn(c1), crn(cfv(cmsr, cv(hs0))))
  rneqd(cfv(cmsr, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmsr, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cmsr, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, cmsr)
  df-msta(hs0)
  rnex(c1)
  fvexi(c1, cmsr, c2)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cmsta, c2), crn(c1), emptycls, crn(emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  eqcomi(emptycls, crn(emptycls))
  rn0()
  fvprc(c2, cmsta)
  rneqd(c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cmsr, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cmsr)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mstaval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ c0 = ran(c1)
  ⊣ c1 =(mStRed ` c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(mStat ` c2)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, ran(c1), (mStat ` c2))
  pm2.61i((mStat ` c2)= ran(c1), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, cmsta, ran(c1), ran((mStRed ` hs0)))
  rneqd((mStRed ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c2)
  syl6eqr((mStRed ` hs0), c1, (mStRed ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, cmsr)
  df-msta(hs0)
  rnex(c1)
  fvexi(c1, cmsr, c2)
  3eqtr4a((mStat ` c2), ran(c1), emptycls, ran(∅), ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqcomi(emptycls, ran(∅))
  rn0()
  fvprc(c2, cmsta)
  rneqd(c1, emptycls, ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (mStRed ` c2), ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c2, cmsr)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(ran(c1))
}

blocks.content: A formal system is a tuple ` <. mCN , mVR , mType , mVT , mTC , mAx >. ` such that: ` mCN ` and ` mVR ` are disjoint; ` mType ` is a function from ` mVR ` to ` mVT ` ; ` mVT ` is a subset of ` mTC ` ; ` mAx ` is a set of statements; and for each variable typecode, there are infinitely many variables of that type. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismfs(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cmfs), wa(wa(wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls), wf(c4, c3, c5)), wa(wss(c6, c7), wral(s0, c8, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), csn(cv(s0))), cfn)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmcn, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmvar, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmty, c0))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cmvt, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmtc, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmax, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmsta, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cmfs), wa(wa(wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls), wf(c4, c3, c5)), wa(wss(c6, c7), wral(s0, c8, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), csn(cv(s0))), cfn))))))), diffsc(s0, c8))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cmfs, wa(wa(wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls), wf(c4, c3, c5)), wa(wss(c6, c7), wral(s0, c8, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), csn(cv(s0))), cfn))))), wa(wa(wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))), emptycls), wf(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmtc, cv(hs0)))), wa(wss(cfv(cmax, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmsta, cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cfv(cmvt, cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0))), csn(cv(s0))), cfn))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))), emptycls), wf(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmtc, cv(hs0)))), wa(wss(cfv(cmax, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmsta, cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cfv(cmvt, cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0))), csn(cv(s0))), cfn)))), wa(wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls), wf(c4, c3, c5)), wa(wss(c6, c7), wral(s0, c8, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), csn(cv(s0))), cfn)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))), emptycls), wf(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmtc, cv(hs0))), wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls), wf(c4, c3, c5))
  eqeq1d(cin(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0))), emptycls, cin(c2, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq12d(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), c2, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmcn, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmcn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmcn)
  feq123d(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmtc, cv(hs0)), c4, c3, c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmvar, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cmvar, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmvar)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmtc, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(cmtc, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmtc)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cfv(cmax, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmsta, cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cfv(cmvt, cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0))), csn(cv(s0))), cfn))), wss(c6, c7), wral(s0, c8, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), csn(cv(s0))), cfn))))
  sseq12d(cfv(cmax, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmsta, cv(hs0)), c6, c7, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmax, cv(hs0)), c6, cfv(cmax, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmax)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmsta, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(cmsta, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmsta)
  raleqbidv(s0, cfv(cmvt, cv(hs0)), c8, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0))), csn(cv(s0))), cfn)), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), csn(cv(s0))), cfn)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmvt, cv(hs0)), c8, cfv(cmvt, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmvt)
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0))), csn(cv(s0))), cfn), wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), csn(cv(s0))), cfn))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0))), csn(cv(s0))), cfn, cima(ccnv(c4), csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq1d(ccnv(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0))), csn(cv(s0)), ccnv(c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveqd(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0)), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmty, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cmty, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmty)
  df-mfs(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wa(wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls), wf(c4, c3, c5)), wa(wss(c6, c7), wral(s0, c8, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), csn(cv(s0))), cfn))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm ismfs(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ mFS ↔(((c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧(c4 : c3 → c5))∧(c6 ⊆ c7 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c8, ¬(`' c4 " { s0 })∈ Fin)))))
  ⊣ c2 =(mCN ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(mVR ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(mType ` c0)
  ⊣ c8 =(mVT ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(mTC ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(mAx ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(mStat ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ mFS ↔(((c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧(c4 : c3 → c5))∧(c6 ⊆ c7 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c8, ¬(`' c4 " { s0 })∈ Fin))))), d(s0, c8))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, cmfs, (((c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧(c4 : c3 → c5))∧(c6 ⊆ c7 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c8, ¬(`' c4 " { s0 })∈ Fin))), ((((mCN ` hs0)⋂(mVR ` hs0))= ∅ ∧((mType ` hs0):(mVR ` hs0)→(mTC ` hs0)))∧((mAx ` hs0)⊆(mStat ` hs0)∧ ∀(s0 ∈(mVT ` hs0), ¬(`'(mType ` hs0)" { s0 })∈ Fin))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (((mCN ` hs0)⋂(mVR ` hs0))= ∅ ∧((mType ` hs0):(mVR ` hs0)→(mTC ` hs0))), ((mAx ` hs0)⊆(mStat ` hs0)∧ ∀(s0 ∈(mVT ` hs0), ¬(`'(mType ` hs0)" { s0 })∈ Fin)), ((c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧(c4 : c3 → c5)), (c6 ⊆ c7 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c8, ¬(`' c4 " { s0 })∈ Fin)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, ((mCN ` hs0)⋂(mVR ` hs0))= ∅, ((mType ` hs0):(mVR ` hs0)→(mTC ` hs0)), (c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅, (c4 : c3 → c5))
  eqeq1d(((mCN ` hs0)⋂(mVR ` hs0)), emptycls, (c2 ⋂ c3), hs0 = c0)
  ineq12d((mCN ` hs0), (mVR ` hs0), c2, c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mCN ` hs0), c2, (mCN ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmcn)
  feq123d((mType ` hs0), (mVR ` hs0), (mTC ` hs0), c4, c3, c5, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mVR ` hs0), c3, (mVR ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmvar)
  syl6eqr((mTC ` hs0), c5, (mTC ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmtc)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (mAx ` hs0)⊆(mStat ` hs0), ∀(s0 ∈(mVT ` hs0), ¬(`'(mType ` hs0)" { s0 })∈ Fin), c6 ⊆ c7, ∀(s0 ∈ c8, ¬(`' c4 " { s0 })∈ Fin))
  sseq12d((mAx ` hs0), (mStat ` hs0), c6, c7, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mAx ` hs0), c6, (mAx ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmax)
  syl6eqr((mStat ` hs0), c7, (mStat ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmsta)
  raleqbidv(s0, (mVT ` hs0), c8, hs0 = c0, ¬(`'(mType ` hs0)" { s0 })∈ Fin, ¬(`' c4 " { s0 })∈ Fin)
  syl6eqr((mVT ` hs0), c8, (mVT ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmvt)
  notbid(hs0 = c0, (`'(mType ` hs0)" { s0 })∈ Fin, (`' c4 " { s0 })∈ Fin)
  eleq1d((`'(mType ` hs0)" { s0 }), cfn, (`' c4 " { s0 }), hs0 = c0)
  imaeq1d(`'(mType ` hs0), { s0 }, `' c4, hs0 = c0)
  cnveqd((mType ` hs0), c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((mType ` hs0), c4, (mType ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmty)
  df-mfs(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((((c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅ ∧(c4 : c3 → c5))∧(c6 ⊆ c7 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c8, ¬(`' c4 " { s0 })∈ Fin))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: mfsdisj
blocks.content: The constants and variables of a formal system are disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mfsdisj(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmfs), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmcn, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmvar, c0))
} = {
  simplld(wcel(c0, cmfs), wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls), wf(cfv(cmty, c0), c2, cfv(cmtc, c0)), wa(wss(cfv(cmax, c0), cfv(cmsta, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cmvt, c0), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, c0)), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn)))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cmfs), wa(wa(wceq(cin(c1, c2), emptycls), wf(cfv(cmty, c0), c2, cfv(cmtc, c0))), wa(wss(cfv(cmax, c0), cfv(cmsta, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cmvt, c0), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, c0)), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn))))))
  ismfs(hs0, c0, cmfs, c1, c2, cfv(cmty, c0), cfv(cmtc, c0), cfv(cmax, c0), cfv(cmsta, c0), cfv(cmvt, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmty, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmvt, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmtc, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmax, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmsta, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmvt, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mfsdisj(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ mFS →(c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅)
  ⊣ c1 =(mCN ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(mVR ` c0)
} = {
  simplld(c0 ∈ mFS, (c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅, ((mType ` c0): c2 →(mTC ` c0)), ((mAx ` c0)⊆(mStat ` c0)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(mVT ` c0), ¬(`'(mType ` c0)" { hs0 })∈ Fin)))
  ibi(c0 ∈ mFS, (((c1 ⋂ c2)= ∅ ∧((mType ` c0): c2 →(mTC ` c0)))∧((mAx ` c0)⊆(mStat ` c0)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(mVT ` c0), ¬(`'(mType ` c0)" { hs0 })∈ Fin))))
  ismfs(hs0, c0, cmfs, c1, c2, (mType ` c0), (mTC ` c0), (mAx ` c0), (mStat ` c0), (mVT ` c0))
  eqid((mType ` c0))
  eqid((mVT ` c0))
  eqid((mTC ` c0))
  eqid((mAx ` c0))
  eqid((mStat ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((mVT ` c0))
}

blocks.name: mtyf2
blocks.content: The type function maps variables to typecodes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mtyf2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmfs), wf(c1, c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmvar, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmtc, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmty, c0))
} = {
  simplrd(wcel(c0, cmfs), wf(c1, c2, c3), wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, c0), c2), emptycls), wa(wss(cfv(cmax, c0), cfv(cmsta, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cmvt, c0), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn)))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cmfs), wa(wa(wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, c0), c2), emptycls), wf(c1, c2, c3)), wa(wss(cfv(cmax, c0), cfv(cmsta, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cmvt, c0), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn))))))
  ismfs(hs0, c0, cmfs, cfv(cmcn, c0), c2, c1, c3, cfv(cmax, c0), cfv(cmsta, c0), cfv(cmvt, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmcn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmvt, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmax, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmsta, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmvt, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mtyf2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ mFS →(c1 : c2 → c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(mVR ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(mTC ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(mType ` c0)
} = {
  simplrd(c0 ∈ mFS, (c1 : c2 → c3), ((mCN ` c0)⋂ c2)= ∅, ((mAx ` c0)⊆(mStat ` c0)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(mVT ` c0), ¬(`' c1 " { hs0 })∈ Fin)))
  ibi(c0 ∈ mFS, ((((mCN ` c0)⋂ c2)= ∅ ∧(c1 : c2 → c3))∧((mAx ` c0)⊆(mStat ` c0)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(mVT ` c0), ¬(`' c1 " { hs0 })∈ Fin))))
  ismfs(hs0, c0, cmfs, (mCN ` c0), c2, c1, c3, (mAx ` c0), (mStat ` c0), (mVT ` c0))
  eqid((mCN ` c0))
  eqid((mVT ` c0))
  eqid((mAx ` c0))
  eqid((mStat ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((mVT ` c0))
}

blocks.name: mtyf
blocks.content: The type function maps variables to variable typecodes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mtyf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmfs), wf(c1, c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmvar, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmvt, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmty, c0))
} = {
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cmfs), wf(c1, c2, c3), wf(c1, c2, crn(c1)))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cmfs), wf(c1, c2, crn(c1)), wf(c1, c2, cfv(cmtc, c0)), wfo(c1, c2, crn(c1)))
  mtyf2(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cmtc, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmtc, c0))
  sylib(wf(c1, c2, cfv(cmtc, c0)), wfo(c1, c2, crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c2))
  ffn(c1, c2, cfv(cmtc, c0))
  dffn4(c1, c2)
  fof(c1, c2, crn(c1))
  ax-mp(wb(wf(c1, c2, c3), wf(c1, c2, crn(c1))), wceq(c3, crn(c1)))
  mvtval(c3, c1, c0)
  feq3(c3, crn(c1), c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mtyf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ mFS →(c1 : c2 → c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(mVR ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(mVT ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(mType ` c0)
} = {
  sylibr(c0 ∈ mFS, (c1 : c2 → c3), (c1 : c2 → ran(c1)))
  3syl(c0 ∈ mFS, (c1 : c2 → ran(c1)), (c1 : c2 →(mTC ` c0)), (c1 : c2 ↠ ran(c1)))
  mtyf2(c0, c1, c2, (mTC ` c0))
  eqid((mTC ` c0))
  sylib((c1 : c2 →(mTC ` c0)), (c1 : c2 ↠ ran(c1)), c1[Fn]c2)
  ffn(c1, c2, (mTC ` c0))
  dffn4(c1, c2)
  fof(c1, c2, ran(c1))
  ax-mp(((c1 : c2 → c3)↔(c1 : c2 → ran(c1))), c3 = ran(c1))
  mvtval(c3, c1, c0)
  feq3(c3, ran(c1), c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: mvtss
blocks.content: The set of variable typecodes is a subset of all typecodes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: maxsta
blocks.content: An axiom is a statement. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm maxsta(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmfs), wss(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmax, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmsta, c0))
} = {
  simprld(wcel(c0, cmfs), wss(c1, c2), wa(wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, c0), cfv(cmvar, c0)), emptycls), wf(cfv(cmty, c0), cfv(cmvar, c0), cfv(cmtc, c0))), wral(hs0, cfv(cmvt, c0), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, c0)), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cmfs), wa(wa(wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, c0), cfv(cmvar, c0)), emptycls), wf(cfv(cmty, c0), cfv(cmvar, c0), cfv(cmtc, c0))), wa(wss(c1, c2), wral(hs0, cfv(cmvt, c0), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(cfv(cmty, c0)), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn))))))
  ismfs(hs0, c0, cmfs, cfv(cmcn, c0), cfv(cmvar, c0), cfv(cmty, c0), cfv(cmtc, c0), c1, c2, cfv(cmvt, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmcn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmvar, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmty, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmvt, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmtc, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmvt, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm maxsta(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ mFS → c1 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(mAx ` c0)

} = {
  simprld(c0 ∈ mFS, c1 ⊆ c2, (((mCN ` c0)⋂(mVR ` c0))= ∅ ∧((mType ` c0):(mVR ` c0)→(mTC ` c0))), ∀(hs0 ∈(mVT ` c0), ¬(`'(mType ` c0)" { hs0 })∈ Fin))
  ibi(c0 ∈ mFS, ((((mCN ` c0)⋂(mVR ` c0))= ∅ ∧((mType ` c0):(mVR ` c0)→(mTC ` c0)))∧(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(mVT ` c0), ¬(`'(mType ` c0)" { hs0 })∈ Fin))))
  ismfs(hs0, c0, cmfs, (mCN ` c0), (mVR ` c0), (mType ` c0), (mTC ` c0), c1, c2, (mVT ` c0))
  eqid((mCN ` c0))
  eqid((mVR ` c0))
  eqid((mType ` c0))
  eqid((mVT ` c0))
  eqid((mTC ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((mVT ` c0))
}

blocks.name: mvtinf
blocks.content: Each variable typecode has infinitely many variables. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mvtinf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmfs), wcel(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(c1)), cfn)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmvt, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmty, c0))
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cmfs), wcel(c1, c2), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(c1)), cfn)), wral(hs0, c2, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn))))
  simprrd(wcel(c0, cmfs), wral(hs0, c2, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn))), wa(wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, c0), cfv(cmvar, c0)), emptycls), wf(c3, cfv(cmvar, c0), cfv(cmtc, c0))), wss(cfv(cmax, c0), cfv(cmsta, c0)))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cmfs), wa(wa(wceq(cin(cfv(cmcn, c0), cfv(cmvar, c0)), emptycls), wf(c3, cfv(cmvar, c0), cfv(cmtc, c0))), wa(wss(cfv(cmax, c0), cfv(cmsta, c0)), wral(hs0, c2, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn))))))
  ismfs(hs0, c0, cmfs, cfv(cmcn, c0), cfv(cmvar, c0), c3, cfv(cmtc, c0), cfv(cmax, c0), cfv(cmsta, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cmcn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmvar, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmtc, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmax, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmsta, c0))
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn)), wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(c1)), cfn)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn), wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(c1)), cfn))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(cv(hs0))), cfn, cima(ccnv(c3), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c3), csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(c1)), cfn)))
}

thm mvtinf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ mFS ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ ¬(`' c3 " { c1 })∈ Fin)
  ⊣ c2 =(mVT ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(mType ` c0)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ∈ mFS, c1 ∈ c2, ¬(`' c3 " { c1 })∈ Fin, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬(`' c3 " { hs0 })∈ Fin))
  simprrd(c0 ∈ mFS, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬(`' c3 " { hs0 })∈ Fin), (((mCN ` c0)⋂(mVR ` c0))= ∅ ∧(c3 :(mVR ` c0)→(mTC ` c0))), (mAx ` c0)⊆(mStat ` c0))
  ibi(c0 ∈ mFS, ((((mCN ` c0)⋂(mVR ` c0))= ∅ ∧(c3 :(mVR ` c0)→(mTC ` c0)))∧((mAx ` c0)⊆(mStat ` c0)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬(`' c3 " { hs0 })∈ Fin))))
  ismfs(hs0, c0, cmfs, (mCN ` c0), (mVR ` c0), c3, (mTC ` c0), (mAx ` c0), (mStat ` c0), c2)
  eqid((mCN ` c0))
  eqid((mVR ` c0))
  eqid((mTC ` c0))
  eqid((mAx ` c0))
  eqid((mStat ` c0))
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, ¬(`' c3 " { hs0 })∈ Fin, ¬(`' c3 " { c1 })∈ Fin)
  notbid(hs0 = c1, (`' c3 " { hs0 })∈ Fin, (`' c3 " { c1 })∈ Fin)
  eleq1d((`' c3 " { hs0 }), cfn, (`' c3 " { c1 }), hs0 = c1)
  imaeq2d(`' c3, { hs0 }, { c1 }, hs0 = c1)
  sneq(hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(¬(`' c3 " { c1 })∈ Fin)
}

blocks.name: msubff1
blocks.content: When restricted to complete mappings, the substitution-producing function is one-to-one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: vhmcls
blocks.content: All variable hypotheses are in the closure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm vhmcls(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmdv, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmex, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmcls, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cmfs))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, c7))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmvh, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cmvar, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
} = {
  sseldd(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, c3, c4), crn(c0), w0)
  unssbd(crn(c0), co(c2, c3, c4), c4, w0)
  ssmclslem(c4, c0, c2, c3, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)), wfn(c0, c8), wcel(c1, c8))
  3syl(w0, wfn(c0, c8), wcel(c6, cmfs), wf(c0, c8, c7))
  mvhf(c6, c0, c8, c7)
  ffn(c0, c8, c7)
  fnfvelrn(c0, c8, c1)
}

  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈(c2[c3]c4))

  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ mFS)

  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c8)
} = {
  sseldd((c0 ` c1), (c2[c3]c4), ran(c0), w0)

  ffn(c0, c8, c7)
  fnfvelrn(c0, c8, c1)
}

blocks.content: The closure is closed under axiom application. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: mclsind
blocks.content: Induction theorem for closure: any other set ` Q ` closed under the axioms and the hypotheses contains all the elements of the closure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mppspst . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

thm mppspstlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0)

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmpps, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmcls, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0), wceq(c0, cfv(cmpst, c2)))

  a1ii(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0), diffss(s1, s2))

  a1ii(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0), diffsc(s2, c2))
  eqsstri(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), c0, cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))))))))
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))
  abssi(hs0, c0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  exlimiv(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  adantrr(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  biimpar(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1d(cv(hs0), c0, cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  biimpri(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  eqeq2i(cv(hs0), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))
  df-ot(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: mppsval
blocks.content: Definition of a provable pre-statement, essentially just a reorganization of the arguments of df-mcls . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mppsval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmpps, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmcls, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))), cfv(cmpps, c3))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cmpps, c3), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c3, universe, cmpps, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(cmpst, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmcls, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))))))
  oprabbidv(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(cmpst, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmcls, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(cmpst, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmcls, cv(hs0)), cv(s1))), wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))
  eleq2d(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(cmpst, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmpst, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cmpst, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cmpst)
  eleq2d(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmcls, cv(hs0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cfv(cmcls, cv(hs0)), cv(s1), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmcls, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmcls, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, cmcls)
  df-mpps(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  ssexi(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))), c1)
  fvexi(c1, cmpst, c3)
  mppspstlem(s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, c3, c0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(cmpps, c3), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))), emptycls, wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  fvprc(c3, cmpps)
  syl5eq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))), emptycls, cab(hs1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))))), wn(wcel(c3, universe)))
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs1, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))
  necon1bi(cab(hs1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))))), emptycls, wcel(c3, universe))
  sylbi(wne(cab(hs1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))))), emptycls), wcel(c3, universe), wex(hs1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))))))
  abn0(hs1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))))))
  exlimivv(hs1, s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))), wcel(c3, universe))
  exlimivv(s1, s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))), wcel(c3, universe))
  ad2antrl(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))), wcel(c3, universe))
  eleq2s(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1, cfv(cmpst, c3), wcel(c3, universe))
  elfvex(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cmpst, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2)), c1), wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c3, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mppsval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ c0 = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))}
  ⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c3)
  ⊣ c0 =(mPPSt ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(mCls ` c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))}, (mPPSt ` c3))
  pm2.61i((mPPSt ` c3)= { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))}, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvmpt(hs0, c3, universe, cmpps, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))}, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈(mPreSt ` hs0)∧ s2 ∈(s0[(mCls ` hs0)]s1))})
  oprabbidv(s0, s1, s2, hs0 = c3, (< s0, s1, s2 > ∈(mPreSt ` hs0)∧ s2 ∈(s0[(mCls ` hs0)]s1)), (< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c3, < s0, s1, s2 > ∈(mPreSt ` hs0), s2 ∈(s0[(mCls ` hs0)]s1), < s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))
  eleq2d(< s0, s1, s2 >, (mPreSt ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c3)
  syl6eqr((mPreSt ` hs0), c1, (mPreSt ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cmpst)
  eleq2d(s2, (s0[(mCls ` hs0)]s1), (s0[c2]s1), hs0 = c3)
  oveqd(s0, (mCls ` hs0), s1, c2, hs0 = c3)
  syl6eqr((mCls ` hs0), c2, (mCls ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, cmcls)
  df-mpps(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  ssexi({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))}, c1)
  fvexi(c1, cmpst, c3)
  mppspstlem(s0, s1, s2, c1, c2, c3, c0)
  eqtr4d((mPPSt ` c3), { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))}, emptycls, ¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c3, cmpps)
  syl5eq({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))}, emptycls, { hs1 | ∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))))))}, ¬ c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs1, (< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))
  necon1bi({ hs1 | ∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))))))}, emptycls, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylbi({ hs1 | ∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))))))} ≠ ∅, c3 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs1, ∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))))))))
  abn0(hs1, ∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))))))
  exlimivv(hs1, s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))))), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  exlimivv(s1, s2, (hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  ad2antrl(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, < s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1, s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  eleq2s(< s0, s1, s2 >, c1, (mPreSt ` c3), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  elfvex(< s0, s1, s2 >, cmpst, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |(< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1))})
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.w((< s0, s1, s2 > ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈(s0[c2]s1)))
  diff.hs1.w(c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: elmpps
blocks.content: Definition of a provable pre-statement, essentially just a reorganization of the arguments of df-mcls . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmpps(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wb(wcel(cotp(c0, c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(cotp(c0, c1, c2), c4), wcel(c2, co(c0, c5, c1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmpst, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmpps, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmcls, c6))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(cotp(c0, c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(cotp(c0, c1, c2), c4), wcel(c2, co(c0, c5, c1))), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)))))))
  eleq12i(cotp(c0, c1, c2), c3, cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))))))
  mppsval(hs0, hs1, hs2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  pm5.21nii(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(cotp(c0, c1, c2), c4), wcel(c2, co(c0, c5, c1))), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)))
  sseli(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), coprab(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))))), cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe))
  oprabss(hs0, hs1, hs2, wa(wcel(cotp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c4), wcel(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(wcel(cotp(c0, c1, c2), c4), wcel(c2, co(c0, c5, c1)), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)))
  syl5eqelr(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe), cotp(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cotp(c0, c1, c2), c4))
  df-ot(c0, c1, c2)
  sseli(cotp(c0, c1, c2), c4, cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe))
  mpstssv(c4, c6)

blocks.name: mthmval
blocks.content: A theorem is a pre-statement, whose reduct is also the reduct of a provable pre-statement. Unlike the difference between pre-statement and statement, this application of the reduct is not necessarily trivial: there are theorems that are not themselves provable but are provable once enough "dummy variables" are introduced. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: mthmi
blocks.content: A statement whose reduct is the reduct of a provable pre-statement is a theorem. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

thm mthmi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

blocks.name: mthmb

blocks.name: mclsppslem
blocks.content: The closure is closed under application of provable pre-statements. (Compare ~ mclsax .) This theorem is what justifies the treatment of theorems as "equivalent" to axioms once they have been proven: the composition of one theorem in the proof of another yields a theorem. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)

blocks.name: mclspps
blocks.content: The closure is closed under application of provable pre-statements. (Compare ~ mclsax .) This theorem is what justifies the treatment of theorems as "equivalent" to axioms once they have been proven: the composition of one theorem in the proof of another yields a theorem. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
